Constructs a {{tt|month}} object.
@1@ Default constructor leaves the month value uninitialized.
@2@ If {{c|m &lt;{{=}} 255}}, constructs a {{tt|month}} object holding the month value {{c|m}}. Otherwise the value held is unspecified.
